description: This file defines a data class CORSSettings to specify Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) configurations, and a function get_cors_settings() that returns a pre-configured instance of CORSSettings, centralizing CORS policy settings for the backend server, primarily allowing frontend access from localhost and its variants.

classes.name: CORSSettings
classes.description: Immutable data class holding CORS configuration options including allowed origins, credentials, methods, and headers.

methods.name: CORSSettings get_cors_settings()
methods.description: Returns a CORSSettings instance with predefined settings allowing local development origins and permitting all methods and headers.
